WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to allow the user can manually enter a radius for the SelectRadius widget
WidgetInfo.Label: Select radius value
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: enter the radius for the Select by Radius tool

Parameter.Name: RadiusName
Parameter.Description: The name of the SelectRadius widget this applies to
Parameter.Label: SelectRadius widget name

Parameter.Name: Label
Parameter.Description: Label to use for this widget
Parameter.Label: Label

Parameter.Name: ClassName
Parameter.Description: CSS class name for the Label
Parameter.Label: CSS Class name
